hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir:That the Prophet was treated by means of cupping when he was in Ihram for a contusion that he had suffered. (Diaf)

chapter.ara-name: باب حِجَامَةِ الْمُحْرِمِ مِنْ عِلَّةٍ تَكُونُ بِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: Cupping To Treat The Muhrim For A Disease He Is Suffering From
